modName: Saber race from fate stay night
summary: Saber\'s race based on how she looks in Fate stay night
descriptionHtml:
she has all the same skin of a nord so i didnt upload a screen of her.
if you have any ideas to add please comment it, help is welcome.

Base data.
i saw that there was no Saber race so i am working on a Saber race.
the male version has the same skills but is un-changed.
the female version will be based on how she looks.
i will upload a picture on how i will base her.
i uploaded a Very bugged version of her.
this version only has some of the skills.
not yet the skin or the combat voice of her.
if you want to help with her creation comment in the box.

Install notes: place the Folders in your Data folder.
uninstall: remove all files that you got in this mod.

Change log:

0.1 initial release + still buggy will work on it when i have more time.
help is welcome.


Mods required or adviced for the best saber feeling.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=131
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13929
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3542
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11550
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10154
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3823
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6146
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3548
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15210 (adult)(adviced)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666 (adult)(adviced)

Other fine mods.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3413(midas magic)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15489(more map markers)

Note: if a mod creator who\'s content is in this mod and isn\'t linked in this mod, please contact me.
author: Dragonlolz and all mod creators that are adviced and required for this mod
